data.title: Food
data.text: Food was alright..not crowded for the location. I will be going back workers were polite and answered all my questions

data.title: love the double fish sandwiches
data.text: I really like Rally's fish sandwiches and fries. The hot is always fresh and hot. I special order my food. Double fish patty,Extra crunchy, extra cheese and extra pickles too. with fries...yummy.

data.title: Open late
data.text: We arrived at our hotel fairly late in the evening and this was the only restaurant in the area that was open. I was happy about that. I'm sure this is a chain, but we don't have them at home. The fries were good, service as pretty fast and reasonably friendly.

data.title: Average service
data.text: rally was good but their burger now are just average. No real life into them. Only saving grace is the fries

data.title: A little bit of everything
data.text: There's not too many Rally's in LA, and they got two in the same city of Hawthorne literally a couple miles from each other...I've only recently tried them, and I go here whenever I have no remorse for gourging anything and everything that is bad for you. Burgers, fries, fried chicken, popcorn shrimp, desserts, etc... They got pretty much everything you could ask for...the oil they fry in has to be months old as it tastes like it's killing you slowly, but it tastes so gooooood. Def not quality but satisfying when you don't care about life...
